name: SUN CAPITAL PARTNERS III, LP, et al., petitioners, v. NEW ENGLAND TEAMTERS & TRUCKING INDUSTRY PENSION FUND.
name_abbreviation: Sun Capital Partners Iii, LP v. New Eng. Teamters & Trucking Indus. Pension Fund

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
SUN CAPITAL PARTNERS III, LP, et al., petitioners,
v.
NEW ENGLAND TEAMTERS & TRUCKING INDUSTRY PENSION FUND.
attorneys: Motion of Private Equity Growth Capital Council for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
SUN CAPITAL PARTNERS III, LP, et al., petitioners,
v.
NEW ENGLAND TEAMTERS & TRUCKING INDUSTRY PENSION FUND.
No. 13-648.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 3, 2014.
Case below, 724 F.3d 129.
Motion of Private Equity Growth Capital Council for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit denied.
